name: Google Analytics
description: Tracks website traffic, user behavior, and conversions in one dashboard.

name: Plausible
description: Lightweight, privacy-friendly analytics with open-source transparency.

name: Matomo
description: Self-hosted analytics platform with full data control and visitor insights.

name: Open Web Analytics
description: Open-source framework for monitoring website and application usage.

name: Clicky
description: Real-time website visitor tracking and engagement monitoring.

name: Fathom Analytics
description: Minimal, privacy-first web analytics without cookies or personal data.

name: Mixpanel
description: Event-based analytics to understand how users interact with products.

name: Heap
description: Automatically captures user actions for behavioral analytics.

name: Simple Analytics
description: Clean, privacy-respecting website analytics without tracking users.

name: GoatCounter
description: Open-source, lightweight web analytics with privacy in mind.

name: Statcounter
description: Visitor tracking and traffic insights for websites.

name: Shynet
description: Open-source web analytics server for event tracking.

name: PostHog
description: Open-source product analytics with event tracking and feature flags.

name: Countly
description: Analytics and engagement platform for web and mobile applications.

name: Cloudflare Web Analytics
description: Privacy-focused website analytics built into Cloudflare.

name: Panelbear
description: Cookie-free web analytics with real-time dashboards.
